title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2508.2 - Delegation of authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2508.2 - Delegation of authority

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Housing and Community Renewal and any
officer of the division designated by the commissioner to carry out any power
of the commissioner under the act or this Chapter may delegate the authority to
carry out any of the duties and powers granted by the act or this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2508.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
